title: Course Projectï¼šECG signal Acquisition, Denoising and Information Parsing
role: Responsible for signal denoising and web-visualization building
description: The objective of this project is to simulate the implementation of a clinical ECG monitor. To this end, the project will acquire, process, and analyze ECG signals using a MATLAB-based data acquisition system and a Django web interface.
